name: Temple Connections
description:
Single Person Gamejam Game (Saint Louis Scatter Jam - 2015)

I decided to make a puzzle type game. The idea was to be able to string things together with connections by left and right clicking different objects that can move. This works, but I didn't really come up with any puzzles, it's more just a tutorial level then anything, but shows all of the mechanics I got in. Not sure if rift support is working still, but I only had 5 minutes to upload this, so, I didn't get to test it, not that it would show at the presentation anyway.
